column1: Topic title: Iskandar admits PAS  syariah agenda did Pakatan in

column8: text

http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/382598Iskandar admits PAS' syariah agenda did Pakatan inZikri Kamarulzaman     18 May 2017Pakatan Rakyat would still be around if PAS did not push forth its syariah reforms agenda, the Islamist party's vice-president Iskandar Samad said.However, Iskandar said, PAS pushed ahead with its agenda nonetheless, claiming the party is not opportunistic."If we are really opportunistic and only do things for votes, we wouldn't do this (push for syariah law amendments)," Iskandar said...--------------------------------------------You know what to do for the full story.
